name: extract-content-speak-ja
description: A Bookmarklet that extracts text and speaks (Japanese only)

scripts.build: cat ./extract-content-javascript/lib/extract-content-all.js ./src/index.js > src/bookmarklet.js && npx webpack build && npx marked README.md > dist/index.html && cp HowToInstall.gif dist && echo '#@&?\"")'`'">ExtractContentSpeakJa'>> dist/index.html

author: Fumikazu Fujiwara
